resources.string:
Custom language Set a custom language. Send logs Send your device's logs to the developer.
Do this only if you were asked to do so. Run SendLog SendLog will collect the device log and send it to the developer.
You will have an opportunity to review and modify the data being sent. Install SendLog Install the free SendLog application to collect the device log and send it to the developer. Donate (Paypal) Donate (Market) Donate/remove ads Remove ads This is an open-source application released under the GPLv3 license. It is free and will remain free. If you really like it or if you are annoyed by the ads, please consider donating. I'll remove the ads for you as soon as possible.
Thank you!

The donation will remove the ads in all apps provided by me. To remove ads, you need to load the noads code. It is available as soon the donation arrives. Please be patient and drop me a mail if it does not work after one day. To verify your donation your donation id (paypal mail address for paypal; gmail address for market) is needed: Paypal/gmail address Load noads code Ads removed! Failed to remove ads! Accept Terms Please accept terms before sending the data. The app will send your donation id along with the md5-hash of your IMEI to the server (http://ub0r.de/donation/). The data is needed to verify your donation.
The data is never given to third party and used only for verifying your donation.

If your phone changes, the noads code will not work anymore. Please drop me a mail to get a new one. Forgot to remove the ads? To finally remove the ads, you nead to load the noads Code. Click to proceed.
